35.eng-name: Sales in which a Price is paid for Goods to be Delivered Later (As-Salam)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:The people used to sell camels on the basis of Habal-al-Habala. The Prophet (ﷺ) forbade such sale. Nafi` explained Habal-al-Habala by saying. "The camel is to be delivered to the buyer after the she-camel gives birth

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّلَمِ إِلَى أَنْ تُنْتَجَ النَّاقَةُ
chapter.eng-name: As-Salam in buying a she-camel to be delivered after it has given birth
